issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
From a new installation, I receive a notification that Appcelerator CLI needs to be updated and then an error ocurrs generating the following error:

!ENTRY com.appcelerator.titanium.update.core 4 4 2015-05-29 06:22:45.727
!MESSAGE Error encountered during update
!SUBENTRY 1 com.appcelerator.titanium.core 4 0 2015-05-29 06:22:45.727
!MESSAGE Appcelerator CLI is currently installing or upgrading. Please wait until it has finished and retry your command afterwards.


h3. Actual Result
The update is not done.

h3. Expected Result
Execute the update

comments.body:
Hello,

We have researched about this issue. Its working fine for our environment. Please follow the following steps for updating Appcelerator Studio:

To Install the Appcelerator Command Line Tools (CLI) , do so from the command line:
{code}sudo npm install appcelerator -g{code}
To install the Latest version SDK, do so from the command line:
{code}appc ti sdk install latest
or
appc ti sdk install (SDK version ){code}

Thanks

Hello [~borjagomez],

Are you still having this issue? Please let us know.

Thanks.
